Summary: I saw an upright cylindrical object silently pass approx. 200 yards up. Low flying. Clay-like texture. I got a great look when it flew in front of moon.
divs: sighting details i was at the field next to my apartment complex (30 yards from backdoor)waiting for my dog to "make". as ususal i was watchng the sky towards the south\southwest. usually there are many planes in the sky (i stand facing d\fw airport which is like 20 miles away) to draw my attention. i always look at them till i am convinced its a plane before i look to the next one. i frequently look behind myself to make sure no one is walking behind me because my dog will react by running or barking unless i tell her to go farther into the field before she sees them. anyway. i looked back behind me and noticed a light moving northwest flying faster than normal, especially for the height it seemed to be at( it was definitly higher than most of the planes that seem to be leaving or headed to dfw, but not as high as a plane flying long distance above you) and i watched it travel over me in a straight path and a steady speed until it went completly past me. i couldnt see it from the back like a plane that had just passed, although there were very thin, fast moving clouds. the light looked larger, and much wider than a plane's and only pointed forward. i seemed attached to the under side of something maybe twice the size of a big jet but i couldnt really make out any details. i did hear the delayed noise like the kind that a jet makes but it was much lower, i remember it almost like a ominous sound from a movie. once it passed i followed my dog to the back door and inside told my friend what i saw. she looked at me like she felt sorry for me and disappointed in me at the same time. i asked her to come outside with me and watch the sky and she said no and continued watching some reality show garbage on tv. i went back to the side ofthe field and watch the sky for about five minuets until my neck started to hurt and went inside. after maybe ten minuets i went on my back patio to smoke, and moved my chair and leaned it back so i could see the sky without looking up. mostly i was just looking at all the differant stars seeing what shapes i could make. then, coming from the east\southeast i saw an upright clyindrical object floating through the sky. i was shocked, i lost my breath and stood up. it kept moving in a straight path much slower than an airplane and the closer it got the better i could see it. it was similar to the dimensions of a waterheater like in a home except more rounded,and i remember it being slightly fatter at the bottom, like a streched out egg shape. it moved at a steady pace far below the clouds that patched the sky, and as it moved it was slowly rotating or rocking a little around i guess its center-axis, but it always stayed upright. when it got between me and the moon (which was very bright), the moonlight feflected of it and i could see it very well. it had no color , but it reminded me of clay or dim rubber in texture. there were no seems in it anywhere or openings i clould see. at that point it didnt seem even two football fields above the ground. it passed the side of my apartment and and out of my field of view. for a brief second i hesitated to follow it, i wanted to get my friend to see it, but i decided to run around the corner and it kept moving into the distance.
trends: There have been 22 other sightings in Denton
There were no other sightings in Denton on or around February 11th 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
